name: Commonwealth ex rel. Collins, Appellant, v. Maroney
name_abbreviation: Commonwealth ex rel. Collins v. Maroney

judges: Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
parties: Commonwealth ex rel. Collins, Appellant, v. Maroney.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
This is an appeal from an order below' dismissing' an action in habeas corpus without hearing.
We affirm. The following recent decisions are controlling: Commonwealth ex rel. Blackshear v. Myers, 419 Pa. 151, 213 A. 2d 378 (1965); Commonwealth ex rel. Knowles v. Rundle, 419 Pa. 300, 213 A. 2d 635 (1965); and, Commonwealth ex rel. Adderley v. Myers, 418 Pa. 366, 211 A. 2d 481 (1965).
Order affirmed.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: John L. Collins, appellant, in propria persona.
Gordon Gelfond and Joseph M. Smith, Assistant District Attorneys, and Arlen Specter, District Attorney, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth ex rel. Collins, Appellant, v. Maroney.
Submitted January 5, 1966.
Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
March 22, 1966:
John L. Collins, appellant, in propria persona.
Gordon Gelfond and Joseph M. Smith, Assistant District Attorneys, and Arlen Specter, District Attorney, for appellee.
